mapper.select: select distinct altbe,altaf,altdate from std_ent_alter_list where timestampdiff(month,altdate ,curdate()) <= 12 and (altitem like '%股东%' or altitem like '%出资人%' or altitem like '%股权%' or altitem like '%投资人%' or altitem like '%认缴资本%' or altitem like '%出资额%') and req_id = #{reqId}

select distinct altbe,altaf,altdate from std_ent_alter_list where timestampdiff(month,altdate ,curdate()) <= 12 and (altitem like '%注册资本%' or altitem like '%注册资金%' or altitem like '%出资总额%' or altitem like '%投资总额%') and req_id = #{reqId}
